entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
